## RetryDelayStrategy.nextDelay() method

Returns delay for a next retry

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nextDelay(error?: Error): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | Error | reason for retrying |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

milliseconds to wait before retrying
